Blog.post: Michal phelps. Most of you probably know him. He swam at the olympics. He medaled seven times, tying the record. he could have broken it, but he gave up his spot for a guy that probably won't be in the next olompics. I wan't any of my readers to comment on this, if he did the right thing of not.

MXC. the best game show ever. Indeed it is :-) (if you watch the show you would get that last sentance) I wan't to give my readers (if any) joy so if you have Spike TV you can watch it. just look at tv schedules on line. on the east coast it's usually on at aaround 5 o clock. (PM)

I HATE parental controls. but my parents (i think) don't trust me. I have reeeeeeeeelly tight control. my dad tightend it so I could not download anything. It SUCKS. Anybody who reads this PLEASE hepl me find a reason to get rid of or loosen my parental controls

You may think I am a geek. you may think I am immature. But I love DBZ. But what I love even more is a good spoof of DBZ. At acid-play.com, in the action sidebar there is a game called Lemming Ball Z (LBZ). LBZ is awsome. there is blood everywhere, but you can turn that off. other than that nothin else of objectionable
Check all these sites out. Comedycentral.com Addictinggames.com Acid-play.com Bigfishgames.com vh1.com More later

My mom just got a new computer. so you know what that means? I get her old one. I am currently typing on it. Her old computer is fine. It's from 1999, it has a bad battery and it's ALT key is missing and the "g" key does not work. Yay. *grumbles* For all the "g"'s I have to copy and paste. that is really a pain.

My cousin does not have IM >:-) So what we do is we Email each other at the same time. It's fine. but really annoying. We have to keep e mailin each other back and forth from readin eachothers email, going to the create mail writin a e-mail. wiating five minutes and doing it all over agian

My parents won't go anywhere. so you know what that means? i dont go any where. since im home schooled I don't get to see many of my friends every day Except for swim team). swim team i good because I can see a lot of my friends there. but it doesn't start until the beginning of september. >:-(

I collect hats. I have over 20 of them. Some of you might thinks that is really weird. Do any of you collect stamps. I tried. I had gotten oven thirty weeks of stamps when I realized "hey I'm going to have to put these somwhere" by that time I had over a hundered little peices of paper. To me sitting down and going throuh each one is really stupid. And weird. I'd rather collect things that I can actually use (like hats)

I am Homeschooled so I started school two weeks ago. some of you probably are homeschooled. the symtoms are overprotectivc parents, of religios ones, or both. thankfully mine are just christan. lots of people i meet say that im the most normal homeschooled person theyve met, which is sort of an insult in a complement. Most people think that homeschoolin is fun. Hey, you get up when you want do a little school and hang around all day with out chanin from you under wear. Let me et one thin straiht. THIS IS NOT HOW IT IS!!!!!!!! I get up at 7, I start school at 8, I et half an hour lunch and get out at 2:30, and have to go swimmin for TWO hours. by the time my mom picks me up (Because i cant drive yet; 1 year 5 months and 26 days to go!) late as usual by then it is five thirty and we eat dinner, I finish whatever school I have left, then it's 7 and we have "Family Time", which in m HO is a "Waste of Time". there. so screw yu school goers. >:-P
my server makes the top of the page of this website overlap, so i have to go to the library to edit the content, so I will post about twice a week. sorry.
